column1: #Text=Toph says : " Dad , I know it 's probably hard for you to see me this way .
#Text=I 've let you had far too much freedom .
#Text=From now on you 'll be cared for and guarded twenty - four hours a day .
#Text=" Poppy says : " We 're doing this for your own good , Toph .
#Text=" Lao says : " Please escort the Avatar and his friends out .
#Text=" Katara says : " Do n't worry , we 'll find you a teacher .
#Text=There are plenty of amazing earthbenders out there .
#Text=" Toph says : " My dad changed his mind .
#Text=He said I was free to travel the world .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Well , we 'd better get out of here , before your dad changes his mind again .
#Text=" Aang says : " You 're going to be a great teacher , Toph .
#Text=" Toph says : " Speaking of which , I want to show you something .
#Text=" Lao says : " I know you two are very different .
#Text=But I believe you have a common interest .
#Text=I want you to do whatever it takes to bring her home .
